data.text: Sikuuigaze mbuli ya iwanhu otenda gehile,
Kwavija onyala himahima kamba mijani,
Mtamanile Mndewa Imulungu, na utende ganogile,
Zahila deng'ho jako kwa Mndewa Imulungu,
Mgwelele Mndewa Imulungu nzila zako,
Koilava kunze haki yako kamba mulenge,
Ukale tuluu kuulongozi wa Mndewa Imulungu,
Sikuugevuzike na uleke ludoko,
Kwavija iwanhu otenda gehile okanhigwa,
Kwavija kisigala kipindi kidodo iwanhu wehile olawanya,
Lakini iwanhu wahole oihazi isi,
Imunhu yehile kogelegeza mbuli ya imunhu mwene haki,
lakini Mndewa komseka,
Iwanhu wehile osomola sime na upinde wao,
Lakini misime yao ingile mmizoyo yao wenyego,
Kidodo kiyelinacho mwene haki kinoga,
Kwavija nguvu za iwanhu wehile zobenigwa,
Mndewa Imulungu koukaliza ugima wa iwanhu wanogile,
zahavika siku zihile hawagwa kinyala,
Lakini iwanhu wehile opotela,
Iwanhu wehile okopa lakini hawabweza,
Kwavija awo otambikilwa na Mndewa Imulungu oihazi isi,
Kamba Mndewa Imulungu yahanogezwa na nzila ya munhu,
Hamoja kogwa, hasigala hasi siku zose,
Nikala mbwanga, na sambi namvele,
Siku zose heyo kokopesha kwa moyo unogile,
Leka gehile utende ganogile,
Kwavija Mndewa Imulungu konogezwa na haki,
Iwanhu wanogile oihazi isi,
Mulomo wa imunhu yanogile olonga mbuli za ubala,
Malagizo ga Imulungu wake ga mmoyo wake,
Wanhu wehile waifisa kuwavamila wene haki,
Mndewa Imulungu hamgela imunhu yanogile mmakono ga iwanhu wehile,
Mtamanile Mndewa Imulungu na ugoge nzila zake,
Nimona imunhu yehile msede,
Lakini kalawanya hakoneke kabili,
Muloleni imunhu yelibule kitala na imunhu yanogile,
Lakini iwanhu wose otenda nzambi obanangwa,
Ukombola wa iwanhu wanogile olawa kwa Mndewa Imulungu,
Mndewa Imulungu kowataza na kowakombola,
